replies.body: URF RITO URF!
More importantly, where's our One-for-Draven Mirror Mode?
Make this happen Rito. ^  {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  {{champion:119}}  {{champion:119}}  {{champion:119}}

{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  I fixed it. You didn't have enough DRAAAAAAAVENNNNNNNN.

All of the children,
asleep in their beds,
While visions of spatulas,
danced in their heads

It was a day full of joy,
a day full of cheer,
Our great Leader Urf,
Was finally here

But as we awoke,
And started the day,
The great one was absent,
He just never came

The sky is now black,
and all hope is gone,
Oh Rito how could you,
What have you done
THIS THIS THIS THIS THIS{{item:3070}}
Yeah he took it from someone else.

Dear Draven,
Do you think that Riot messed up, not giving us URF? Personally, URF is one of the only fun things about the game anymore, because it's somewhere no one is really toxic at all, and it just makes this awful community so... not awful. Thanks!
Basically, we want URF, not you.
I realize many people are upset because they want urf right now, but urf **will** be coming back this year.  They said it wouldn't be coming for April fools day though.

They also said it will be coming for a grand total of 6 days this year, since each Featured Game will only be available Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, and they've said URF is coming twice. 

I need more URF than that in my life, you know?
Also the thing is, Urf means more coming on April fools tbh.
#BringUsURF {{item:3070}}
i used to main draven..... never playing him again now
Dear Draven, where the hell is URF?

Who thinks its URF hiding behind that huge draven mask?
#BRINGURF2016

Dear Draven,
Where the F*** IS URF?
- URF Player
How dare Riot do something new and unexpected for April Fool's Day. This is obviously a day where everyone is supposed to be predictable and do the same thing every single year!
4th time resetting game hoping for urf

Dear Draven,

My friend says that you aren't a real Marksman because you use axes.
What should i tell him?
Draven is his own role:Draaaaaven
Woke up at 5 a.m. just to play urf like last year and was terribly disappointed, and now I can't fall back asleep.
same but I was up at 4

Rotating Game modes Que is a horrible idea in my opinion. Putting a fun game mode on the weekend instead of giving it to us for a full week? Imagine all the unlucky players that work or tend to families over the weekend that will never get to experience stress relieving game modes with less toxic players that actually promote fun. We didnt want this Draven bullshit, we wanted a week of URF. Riot, you're pushing us farther and farther toward the edge of the cliff.{{item:3070}}
They should keep the regular game mode schedules with urf on april first and stuff like that, but also add in the rotating game mode queue, this way we get even more fun modes.

If you have a family, you probably shouldn't be playing league. Or any online-multiplayer game, really. Stick to games with pause buttons so you can get up and feed your children, or take them to the hospital after they fall face-first into the knives drawer because you weren't looking at them.
this guy lmao
right? lol
Please URF mode T.T {{champion:32}}
dear {{champion:119}} ive been waiting a year for URF....i see your ugly face everyday...now its bigger and everywhere.....

Dear Draven
Someone at Rito thought it would be better to give us draven heads and more draven when all we wanted was URF. This is a bad April fools joke because no one really wants you over everything except if you were plastered over urf. 
Love, Disappointed League Player

Dear Disappointed League Player
APRIL FOOLS here's URF not draven.
RITO

Dear Draven,
         _Where's Amumu's party?_ ╭( ๐_๐)╮

Wonder what riot thinks when they see all the wtf where is urf posts. The draven heads thing is kind of neat but pretty annoying after a few games. They might not turn urf on but hope they at least get the game mode rotation started soon cause this draven thing seems like a huge disappointment for a lot of players.
Where is URF?
{{champion:119}}  can get his birthday party but {{champion:104}} can't get his cigar?
ok april fools jokes over tho, where the urf? {{item:3070}}
i decree we start a petition to remove draven day from our calender's and bring back URF. Long live URF. i realize this might start a civil war

I hope everyone realizes that this is just a sick, sick April fools joke -_-


I hope...
Pretty sure it's a joke guys. Why else would they release an "Urf Kench" skin? Rito rustled the jimmies of thousands of people. It's beautiful.

Hello.....?
It's me......
I've been wondering was it all a joke are you hiding under the scene.....
they say times suppose to heal ya but i cant wait any longer....
Hello riot..... can you hear me?
Im in Missouri more like misery my life is not complete without my love.....
I need it back.....
I've waited all damn year to have you prank me like that?....
So hello from the players sideeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
id like you to know how we striiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiive
we just want our urf back u dont gotta be so rudeeeeee
and i know it sounds a biiiiit crude but you knoooowww.....{{item:3070}}
Dear draven, i'm in love with Draven what do I do?
Don't be jealous. {{champion:119}}
But Rito why?{{item:3070}}
Honestly riot, no one cares about this, just bring us urf

April 1st Draven Theme?
Whynot Taric Theme? {{item:3073}}
Bet Taric would be outraged. Truly Truly outraged at the site of this.
Truly truly outraged that we got this instead of URF.
URF PLEASE URF
{{champion:119}} Guys calm down its not even 12 AM April 1st in North America {{champion:119}}
